articles.author: Dan Goodin
articles.title: Invisible text that AI chatbots understand and humans can’t? Yep, it’s a thing. - Ars Technica
articles.description: A quirk in the Unicode standard harbors an ideal steganographic code channel.

articles.author: Brody Ford
articles.title: Adobe Launches AI Video Generator in Race With OpenAI, Meta - Bloomberg
articles.description: Adobe Inc. unveiled artificial intelligence tools that can create and modify videos, joining Big Tech companies and startups in trying to capitalize on demand for the emerging technology.
articles.content:
